;;;107    {
000002  4602              MOV      r2,r0
000004  460b              MOV      r3,r1
;;;108      uint32_t index = 0;
000006  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
;;;109      
;;;110      for(index = 0; index < BufferLength; index++)
000008  bf00              NOP      
00000a  e004              B        |L1.22|
                  |L1.12|
;;;111      {
;;;112        CRC->DR = pBuffer[index];
00000c  f8520021          LDR      r0,[r2,r1,LSL #2]
000010  4c03              LDR      r4,|L1.32|
000012  6020              STR      r0,[r4,#0]
000014  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1              ;110
                  |L1.22|
000016  4299              CMP      r1,r3                 ;110
000018  d3f8              BCC      |L1.12|
;;;113      }
;;;114      return (CRC->DR);
00001a  4801              LDR      r0,|L1.32|
00001c  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]
;;;115    }
00001e  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;116    
                          ENDP

                  |L1.32|
                          DCD      0x40023000

                          AREA ||i.CRC_CalcCRC||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  CRC_CalcCRC PROC
;;;92       */
;;;93     uint32_t CRC_CalcCRC(uint32_t Data)
000000  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;94     {
;;;95       CRC->DR = Data;
000002  4802              LDR      r0,|L2.12|
000004  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]

00000a  0000              DCW      0x0000

000006  0000              DCW      0x0000

;;;85       CRC->CR = CRC_CR_RESET;
